content:
path /v3/litecoin/info
operationId LtcGetBlockChainInfo
summary Get Litecoin Blockchain Information
description 5 credits per API call
Get Litecoin Blockchain Information Obtain basic info like testnet / mainnet version of the chain current block number and its hash
Examples of using this endpoint with the Tatum JS SDK can be found in Tatum LTC SDK
responses
200
LtcInfo
type object
properties
chain
type string
description Chain of the blockchain main or test
blocks
type number
description Last block
headers
type number
description Last headers
bestblockhash
type string
description Hash of the last block
difficulty
type number
description Difficulty of the PoW algorithm
description OK
